backend/main.mo: Actor providing user-profile storage with access control, authorization mixins, and profile CRUD restricted by permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy-to-new migration types and returns an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing proposal-related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/BUILD_NOTES.md: Build notes describing architecture, deterministic logic, storage, sync behavior, admin tools, and accessibility guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint setting metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/REDESIGN_PROPOSAL.md: Full proposal outlining a from-scratch deterministic redesign of Onebit with expanded UX, wellness support, and removal of demo mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing app flow, session state, accessibility settings, and dialogs including Quick Add and admin settings.
frontend/src/components/AccessibilityCon: Provides a floating popover with toggles for high contrast and large font settings, loading and saving preferences via a11y settings store.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin dialog for editing demo content, sync settings, daily anchors, and microstep categories, with persistence and II-based sync control.
frontend/src/components/ApiKeyDialog.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/QuickAddDialog.t: Modal for quickly adding text items with keyboard shortcuts and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/ReflectionPrompt: Dialog prompting end-of-day reflections, saving or skipping entries through the reflections store.
frontend/src/demo/demoFlows.ts: Defines preset demo flow configurations representing sample session inputs.
frontend/src/demo/demoSessions.ts: Provides predefined demo session history objects with outcomes and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Custom countdown timer hook with start, pause, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth provider and hook, handling login, stored identities, and related status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining design tokens, themes, and accessibility modes like dark mode and large-font mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/ActionModePage.tsx: Timer-driven action page where users start working, add a quick note, and check in when done.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInPage.tsx: Simple page letting users choose an outcome of their session such as done, stuck, or avoided.
frontend/src/pages/ContextPage.tsx: Collects user context by selecting a blocker and a time bucket before proceeding.
frontend/src/pages/FinalizationChecklist: Editable finalization checklist with persisted settings like logo choice, accent color, and demo inputs.
Processes user input to generate a compressed action, fallback, and rationale before continuing.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays past sessions, demo mode data, habit stats, and reflection prompts, with export and date formatting helpers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the landing screen with pitch text, daily anchor, optional demo video, and buttons to start normal or demo mode.
frontend/src/pages/MentalDumpPage.tsx: Collects the user's mental dump text, restores drafts, auto-saves updates, and moves to the next step.
frontend/src/pages/RecoveryPage.tsx: Generates and displays deterministic recovery messages and micro-steps based on session outcome, with actions to retry or start new.
frontend/src/pages/SessionEndPage.tsx: Saves the completed session to storage, shows a summary of results, and offers navigation to history or a new session.
frontend/src/store/a11ySettings.ts: Loads, saves, and applies accessibility settings such as high contrast and large font to the document root.
frontend/src/store/adminSettings.ts: Manages loading and storing the demo video link and pitch text in localStorage.
frontend/src/store/dailyAnchorPhrases.ts: Loads, stores, and cycles daily anchor phrases, providing one based on the day of year.
frontend/src/store/demoMode.ts: Tracks demo mode status, loading and saving it to localStorage.
frontend/src/store/finalizationChecklist: Stores and updates finalization checklist data such as branding, demo inputs, and approvals in localStorage.
frontend/src/store/microStepLibrary.ts: Manages loading, storing, and updating categorized micro-step templates in localStorage.
frontend/src/store/reflectionsStore.ts: Handles daily reflections storage, retrieval, and prompt-tracking using localStorage.
frontend/src/store/sessionStore.ts: Stores drafts and completed sessions, manages mental dump updates, and persists sessions in localStorage.
frontend/src/store/syncSettings.ts: Loads and toggles a boolean sync-enabled setting backed by localStorage.
frontend/src/sync/sessionSync.ts: Stub functions for future session syncing; all currently return false or empty arrays.
frontend/src/utils/deterministicDemoInpu: Provides fixed demo inputs with mental dumps, blockers, and time buckets.
frontend/src/utils/deterministicFocusCom: Parses task lists to pick a primary action and fallback based on scoring and time constraints.
frontend/src/utils/deterministicRecovery: Generates recovery messages and micro-steps based on task category and session outcome.
frontend/src/utils/exportSessionsTxt.ts: Exports stored sessions into a formatted downloadable .txt file.
frontend/src/utils/habitMemory.ts: Computes number of unique active days in the last 14 days based on session timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/llmOutputPolicy.ts: Empty file placeholder for LLM output policy logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across routing and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s versioned state plus a detailed list of existing features with their ids, descriptions, and synonyms. Describes the user’s latest request for a full redesign proposal of Onebit from scratch.
